body: I'm excited to apply for the [Job Title] position at [Company Name]. With a strong foundation in [insert 1–2 strengths like AI automation, web development, etc.] and a passion for solving real-world problems through code, I believe I would be a valuable addition to your team.

In my recent experience at [Previous Company or Project], I [describe a key achievement, such as 'developed a scalable backend system that reduced load times by 30%']. This aligns closely with your need for someone who can [relate it to a job requirement, like 'build reliable, high-performance applications']. My expertise in [insert key technologies like Python, React, etc.] has enabled me to deliver results quickly and collaboratively.

What draws me to [Company Name] is your focus on [insert something unique about the company or mission, like 'open-source innovation' or 'AI in healthcare']. That mission resonates with my own values and goals, and I’m eager to contribute to meaningful projects that make a difference.

I've attached my resume, which includes projects like [Project Name, e.g., JobGPT], demonstrating my ability to think critically, adapt quickly, and deliver quality code. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to [Company Name] and help bring your goals to life.
